reviewText: I don't think I've ever seen such a high caliber of acting skills as were  displayed in this fine example of celluloid genius. The character  development from start to finish was heartwarming and intriguing. What an  original idea too! I mean, a Golden Bear! This movie would have to be  ranked up there with Casablanca, Citizen Kane and Shawshank Redemption.  Please people, honestly, this film is a cinematic suppository and you  actually run a risk of decreased intellect by watching it. BEWARE!
